archetypes.name: Brute
archetypes.description: Hits hard, thinks rarely. Built for raw force and frontline chaos.

archetypes.name: Scout
archetypes.description: Fast, light, and observant. Prefers speed and subtlety over brute strength.

archetypes.name: Tactician
archetypes.description: A master of plans and manipulation. Physically weak, mentally sharp.

archetypes.name: Brawler
archetypes.description: Scrappy and aggressive. Unrefined but effective in close combat.

archetypes.name: Assassin
archetypes.description: Precise, cold, and efficient. Prefers clean kills and silent exits.

archetypes.name: Mystic
archetypes.description: Frailer than most, but frighteningly intelligent. Sees what others don’t.

archetypes.name: Wildcard
archetypes.description: No one knows what you're getting. Could be a genius, a moron, or both.

archetypes.name: Survivor
archetypes.description: Balanced and adaptable. Never the best, never the worst — always alive.
